insults: %% is like one of those callbacks that just won't fire.
I slap thee verily with a trout quite large, %%!

help.password: To reset your password, type `jitsu users forgot [username]`. To change it, type `jitsu users changepassword`.
help.handbook: The complete Nodejitsu handbook can be read at http://github.com/nodejitsu/handbook
help.support: If no one is here to help you, type `!support [msg]` to send an email to support@nodejitsu.com.
help.blog: Our blog can be viewed at http://blog.nodejitsu.com - a number of tutorials can be found there.
help.forever: Run and monitor your node.js processes forever - http://github.com/indexzero/forever
help.http-proxy: A robust, full-featured HTTP proxy for Node.js with full websocket support - http://github.com/nodejitsu/node-http-proxy
help.jitsu: A CLI tool for deploying your apps to the Nodejitsu hosting platform - http://github.com/nodejitsu/jitsu
help.hook.io: A distributed cross-platform namespaced event system using dnode and EventEmitter2 - http://github.com/hookio/hook.io
help.node-prompt: An easy-to-use library for getting input from users while your program is running - http://github.com/nodejitsu/node-prompt
help.gh: Link to GitHub repositories, issues and commits: `!gh [user]`, `!gh [user]/[project]`, `!gh [user]/[project]@[sha]`, `!gh [user]/[project]#[issue]` are supported
help.like: Type !like [drink] to select drink you get when you receive karma

twitter.consumer_key: Public key for Streaming API access
twitter.consumer_secret: Secret key for Streaming API access
twitter.access_token_key: Public key for REST API access
twitter.access_token_secret: Secret key for REST API access
